verses.verse: <S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G322>appointed<s%> <S%G1440>seventy<s%> <S%G2087>others,<s%> and <S%G649>sent<s%> them <S%G1417>two<s%> and <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G4253>ahead<s%> <S%G4383><s%> of Him to <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G4172>city<s%> and <S%G5117>place<s%> <S%G3757>where<s%> He <S%G846>Himself<s%> was <S%G3195>going<s%> to <S%G2064>come.<s%>

And He was <S%G3004>saying<s%> to them, "The <S%G2326>harvest<s%> is <S%G4183>plentiful,<s%> but the <S%G2040>laborers<s%> are <S%G3641>few;<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G1189>beseech<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> of the <S%G2326>harvest<s%> to <S%G1544>send<s%> out <S%G2040>laborers<s%> into His <S%G2326>harvest.<s%>
<S%G5217>"Go<s%> your <S%G5217>ways;<s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> I <S%G649>send<s%> you out as <S%G704>lambs<s%> in the <S%G3319>midst<s%> of <S%G3074>wolves.<s%>

<S%G941>"Carry<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G905>purse,<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G4082>bag,<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G5266>shoes;<s%> and <S%G782>greet<s%> <S%G3367>no<s%> <S%G3367>one<s%> on the <S%G3598>way.<s%>
"And <S%G3739>whatever<s%> <S%G302><s%> <S%G3614>house<s%> you <S%G1525>enter,<s%> <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G3004>say,<s%> <S%G1515>'Peace<s%> [be] to <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3624>house.<s%>'

"And <S%G1437>if<s%> a <S%G5207>man<s%> of <S%G1515>peace<s%> is <S%G1563>there,<s%> your <S%G1515>peace<s%> will <S%G1879>rest<s%> upon him; but <S%G1487>if<s%> not, it will <S%G344>return<s%> to you.

"And <S%G3306>stay<s%> in that <S%G3614>house,<s%> <S%G2068>eating<s%> and <S%G4095>drinking<s%> what they <S%G3844>give<s%> you; for the <S%G2040>laborer<s%> is <S%G514>worthy<s%> of his <S%G3408>wages.<s%> Do not keep <S%G3327>moving<s%> from <S%G3614>house<s%> to <S%G3614>house.<s%>
"And <S%G3739>whatever<s%> <S%G302><s%> <S%G4172>city<s%> you <S%G1525>enter,<s%> and they <S%G1209>receive<s%> you, <S%G2068>eat<s%> what is <S%G3908>set<s%> <S%G3908>before<s%> you;
and <S%G2323>heal<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> in it who are <S%G772>sick,<s%> and <S%G3004>say<s%> to them, 'The <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> has <S%G1448>come<s%> <S%G1448>near<s%> to you.'
"But <S%G3739>whatever<s%> <S%G302><s%> <S%G4172>city<s%> you <S%G1525>enter<s%> and they do not <S%G1209>receive<s%> you, <S%G1831>go<s%> out into its <S%G4116>streets<s%> and <S%G3004>say,<s%>

<S%G2532>'Even<s%> the <S%G2868>dust<s%> of your <S%G4172>city<s%> which <S%G2853>clings<s%> to our <S%G4228>feet,<s%> we <S%G631>wipe<s%> <S%G631>off<s%> [in protest] against you; <S%G4133>yet<s%> be <S%G1097>sure<s%> of <S%G3778>this,<s%> that the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> has <S%G1448>come<s%> <S%G1448>near.<s%>'
"I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, it will be <S%G414>more<s%> <S%G414>tolerable<s%> in that <S%G2250>day<s%> for <S%G4670>Sodom,<s%> <S%G2228>than<s%> for that <S%G4172>city.<s%>

<S%G3759>"Woe<s%> to you, <S%G5523>Chorazin!<s%> <S%G3759>Woe<s%> to you, <S%G966>Bethsaida!<s%> For <S%G1487>if<s%> the <S%G1411>miracles<s%> had been <S%G1096>performed<s%> in <S%G5184>Tyre<s%> and <S%G4605>Sidon<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G1096>occurred<s%> in you, they would have <S%G3340>repented<s%> <S%G3819>long<s%> <S%G3819>ago,<s%> <S%G2521>sitting<s%> in <S%G4526>sackcloth<s%> and <S%G4700>ashes.<s%>
"But it will be <S%G414>more<s%> <S%G414>tolerable<s%> for <S%G5184>Tyre<s%> and <S%G4605>Sidon<s%> in the <S%G2920>judgment,<s%> <S%G2228>than<s%> for you.
"And you, <S%G2746>Capernaum,<s%> will not be <S%G5312>exalted<s%> to <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> will you? You will be <S%G2597>brought<s%> <S%G2597>down<s%> to <S%G86>Hades!<s%>

"The one who <S%G191>listens<s%> to you <S%G191>listens<s%> to Me, and the one who <S%G114>rejects<s%> you <S%G114>rejects<s%> Me; and he who <S%G114>rejects<s%> Me <S%G114>rejects<s%> the One who <S%G649>sent<s%> Me."

And the <S%G1440>seventy<s%> <S%G5290>returned<s%> with <S%G5479>joy,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2962>"Lord,<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> the <S%G1140>demons<s%> are <S%G5293>subject<s%> to us in Your <S%G3686>name.<s%>"
And He <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, "I was <S%G2334>watching<s%> <S%G4567>Satan<s%> <S%G4098>fall<s%> from <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G5613>like<s%> <S%G796>lightning<s%>.

<S%G2400>"Behold,<s%> I have <S%G1325>given<s%> you <S%G1849>authority<s%> to <S%G3961>tread<s%> upon <S%G3789>serpents<s%> and <S%G4651>scorpions,<s%> and <S%G1909>over<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1411>power<s%> of the <S%G2190>enemy,<s%> and <S%G3762>nothing<s%> shall <S%G91>injure<s%> you.

<S%G4133>"Nevertheless<s%> do not <S%G5463>rejoice<s%> in <S%G3778>this,<s%> that the <S%G4151>spirits<s%> are <S%G5293>subject<s%> to you, but <S%G5463>rejoice<s%> that your <S%G3686>names<s%> are <S%G1449>recorded<s%> in <S%G3772>heaven.<s%>"

At that <S%G846>very<s%> <S%G5610>time<s%> He <S%G21>rejoiced<s%> <S%G21>greatly<s%> in the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit,<s%> and <S%G3004>said,<s%> "I <S%G1843>praise<s%> Thee, O <S%G3962>Father,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven<s%> and <S%G1093>earth,<s%> that Thou didst <S%G613>hide<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> from [the] <S%G4680>wise<s%> and <S%G4908>intelligent<s%> and didst <S%G601>reveal<s%> them to <S%G3516>babes.<s%> <S%G3483>Yes,<s%> <S%G3962>Father,<s%> for <S%G3779>thus<s%> it was well-pleasing in Thy <S%G1715>sight.<s%>

<S%G3956>"All<s%> <S%G3956>things<s%> have been <S%G3860>handed<s%> <S%G3860>over<s%> to Me by My <S%G3962>Father,<s%> and <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>one<s%> <S%G1097>knows<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> is <S%G1508>except<s%> the <S%G3962>Father,<s%> and <S%G5101>who<s%> the <S%G3962>Father<s%> is <S%G1508>except<s%> the <S%G5207>Son,<s%> and anyone to <S%G3739>whom<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> <S%G1014>wills<s%> to <S%G601>reveal<s%> [Him.]"

And <S%G4762>turning<s%> to the <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> He <S%G3004>said<s%> <S%G2596>privately,<s%> <S%G2398><s%> <S%G3107>"Blessed<s%> [are] the <S%G3788>eyes<s%> which <S%G991>see<s%> the things you <S%G991>see,<s%>

for I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, that <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G4396>prophets<s%> and <S%G935>kings<s%> <S%G2309>wished<s%> to <S%G3708>see<s%> the things <S%G3739>which<s%> you <S%G991>see,<s%> and did not <S%G3708>see<s%> [them,] and to <S%G191>hear<s%> the things <S%G3739>which<s%> you <S%G191>hear,<s%> and did not <S%G191>hear<s%> [them.] "

And <S%G2400>behold,<s%> a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G3544>lawyer<s%> <S%G450>stood<s%> up and <S%G1598>put<s%> Him to the <S%G1598>test,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G1320>"Teacher,<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> shall I <S%G4160>do<s%> to <S%G2816>inherit<s%> <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%>?"
And He <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G5101>"What<s%> is <S%G1125>written<s%> in the <S%G3551>Law<s%>? <S%G4459>How<s%> does it <S%G314>read<s%> to you?"

And he <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said,<s%> "You shall <S%G25>love<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> your <S%G2316>God<s%> with <S%G3650>all<s%> your <S%G2588>heart,<s%> and with <S%G3650>all<s%> your <S%G5590>soul,<s%> and with <S%G3650>all<s%> your <S%G2479>strength,<s%> and with <S%G3650>all<s%> your <S%G1271>mind;<s%> and your <S%G4139>neighbor<s%> as <S%G4572>yourself.<s%>"
And He <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, "You have <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G3723>correctly;<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G3778>this,<s%> and you will <S%G2198>live.<s%>"
But <S%G2309>wishing<s%> to <S%G1344>justify<s%> <S%G1438>himself,<s%> he <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> "And <S%G5101>who<s%> is my <S%G4139>neighbor<s%>?"

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5274>replied<s%> and <S%G3004>said,<s%> "A <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> was <S%G2597>going<s%> <S%G2597>down<s%> from <S%G2419>Jerusalem<s%> to <S%G2410>Jericho;<s%> and he <S%G4045>fell<s%> <S%G4045>among<s%> <S%G3027>robbers,<s%> and they <S%G1562>stripped<s%> him and <S%G2007>beat<s%> <S%G4127><s%> him, and <S%G565>went<s%> <S%G565>off<s%> <S%G863>leaving<s%> him <S%G2253>half<s%> <S%G2253>dead.<s%>

"And by <S%G4795>chance<s%> a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G2409>priest<s%> was <S%G2597>going<s%> <S%G2597>down<s%> on that <S%G3598>road,<s%> and when he <S%G3708>saw<s%> him, he <S%G492>passed<s%> by on the <S%G492>other<s%> <S%G492>side.<s%>

"And <S%G3668>likewise<s%> a <S%G3019>Levite<s%> <S%G2532>also,<s%> when he <S%G2064>came<s%> to the <S%G5117>place<s%> and <S%G3708>saw<s%> him, <S%G492>passed<s%> by on the <S%G492>other<s%> <S%G492>side.<s%>
"But a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G4541>Samaritan,<s%> who was on a <S%G3593>journey,<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> upon him; and when he <S%G3708>saw<s%> him, he <S%G4697>felt<s%> <S%G4697>compassion,<s%>

and <S%G4334>came<s%> to him, and <S%G2611>bandaged<s%> up his <S%G5134>wounds,<s%> <S%G2022>pouring<s%> <S%G1637>oil<s%> and <S%G3631>wine<s%> on [them;] and he <S%G1913>put<s%> him on his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G2934>beast,<s%> and <S%G71>brought<s%> him to an <S%G3829>inn,<s%> and <S%G1959>took<s%> <S%G1959>care<s%> of him.

"And on the <S%G839>next<s%> <S%G839>day<s%> he <S%G1544>took<s%> out <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G1220>denarii<s%> and <S%G1325>gave<s%> them to the <S%G3830>innkeeper<s%> and <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G1959>'Take<s%> <S%G1959>care<s%> of him; and <S%G3739>whatever<s%> <S%G5100><s%> <S%G302><s%> <S%G4325>more<s%> you <S%G4325>spend,<s%> <S%G1722>when<s%> I <S%G1880>return,<s%> I will <S%G591>repay<s%> you.'
<S%G5101>"Which<s%> of <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G5140>three<s%> do you <S%G1380>think<s%> <S%G1096>proved<s%> to be a <S%G4139>neighbor<s%> to the man who <S%G1706>fell<s%> into the robbers' [hands?]"

And he <S%G3004>said,<s%> "The one who <S%G4160>showed<s%> <S%G1656>mercy<s%> <S%G3326>toward<s%> him." And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G4198>"Go<s%> and <S%G4160>do<s%> the <S%G3668>same.<s%>"

<S%G1161>Now<s%> as they were <S%G4198>traveling<s%> along, He <S%G1525>entered<s%> a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G2968>village;<s%> and a <S%G1135>woman<s%> <S%G3686>named<s%> <S%G3136>Martha<s%> <S%G5264>welcomed<s%> Him into her <S%G3614>home.<s%>

And she <S%G1510>had<s%> a <S%G79>sister<s%> <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G3137>Mary,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G2532>moreover<s%> was <S%G191>listening<s%> to the Lord's <S%G3056>word,<s%> <S%G3869>seated<s%> at His <S%G4228>feet.<s%>

But <S%G3136>Martha<s%> was <S%G4049>distracted<s%> with <S%G4183>all<s%> her <S%G1248>preparations;<s%> and she <S%G2186>came<s%> up [to Him,] and <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G2962>"Lord,<s%> do You not <S%G3199>care<s%> that my <S%G79>sister<s%> has <S%G2641>left<s%> me to <S%G1247>do<s%> all the <S%G1247>serving<s%> <S%G3441>alone<s%>? <S%G3767>Then<s%> <S%G3004>tell<s%> her to <S%G4878>help<s%> me."

But the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to her, <S%G3136>"Martha,<s%> <S%G3136>Martha,<s%> you are <S%G3309>worried<s%> and <S%G7093>bothered<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> so <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G4183>things;<s%>

but [only] a <S%G3641>few<s%> <S%G3641>things<s%> are <S%G5532>necessary,<s%> <S%G2228>really<s%> [only] <S%G1520>one,<s%> for <S%G3137>Mary<s%> has <S%G1586>chosen<s%> the <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G3310>part,<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> shall not be <S%G851>taken<s%> <S%G851>away<s%> from her. "
